title: Cetacean Dataset — cetacean_data
text: dataset containing  whales dolphins spent period time captive US 1938 May 7, 2017. See: https://pudding.cool/2017/07/cetaceans/

title: Cetacean Dataset — cetacean_data
text: tibble 2194 rows 20 columns: species common name individual's species id Identification numbers assigned animal name individual animal's name sex individual animal's sex accuracy accuracy animal's birth date, = actual date, e = estimated date, u = unknown birthYear year individual animal born acquisition method animal acquired originDate year animal entered captivity originLocation location animal originated mother name animal's biological mother father name animal's biological father transfers list facilities animal transferred , approximate dates transferred currently location living animal currently resides last known location region region world animal either currently -recently lived status current status animal. statusDate date animal's status changed COD animal's reported cause death. notes Additional notes e.g names transferDate date animal transferred US transfer types transfers animal involved entryDate date individual animal entered US captive population.
